# First line is two numbers 
#     First value is '2', it means 'histogram mode'
#     Second value is 'Emin' of the histogram
# Other lines : 2 columns. 1) energy 2) probability (nb divided by NbEvent)
# Number of bins = 100
# Content below the first bin: 0
# Content above the last  bin: 0
# Content above the last  bin: 0
# Number of events: 100000000
